channel.title: Projects on Iason Svoronos - Kanavas
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Iason Svoronos - Kanavas

item.title: Exploring Perception in AVAS models using simulation methods
item.description: In my MSc project Soni-Cross, I first developed an AVAS sound model based on a physical model of a ‘rolling’ sphere (software), as it is suggested that ‘rolling sounds’ can better communicate the perception of Electric Vehicles. The model was strongly influenced by: Conan, Simon, et al. “Rolling sound synthesis: work in progress.” 9th International Symposium on Computer Music Modeling and Retrieval (CMMR). 2012. I created a state-of-the-art audio-visual simulation framework for AVAS testing.
